timeline.bodyText: We probably can mark old createApplication() as deprecated (in core and RPC javadoc). I don't think anybody else is using it directly.
timeline.author: zlamalp
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -229,6 +229,19 @@ */ List createApplication(PerunSession user, Application application, List data) throws PerunException; + /** + * Creates a new application and if succeeds, trigger validation and approval. + * + *

The method triggers approval for VOs with auto-approved applications. + * + * @param session user present in session + * @param application application + * @param data data + * @return submitted application + * @throws PerunException + */ + Application submitApplication(PerunSession session, Application application, List data) throws PerunException;

timeline.bodyText: You must specify data type in return for RPC docs: @return Application Submitted application
timeline.author: zlamalp
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -601,6 +601,29 @@ public Application call(ApiCaller ac, Deserializer parms) throws PerunException
 
 	},
 
+	/*#
+	 * Creates a new application.
+	 * The method triggers approval for VOs with auto-approved applications.
+	 *
+	 * @param app Application Application JSON object
+	 * @param data List<ApplicationFormItemData> List of ApplicationFormItemData JSON objects
+	 * @return submitted Application

timeline.message:
new method submitApplication

- new method submitApplication was created, which works same as
  createApplication but it returns application instead of an application
  id. It will be used by perun-wui.
- submitApplication was also added to the OpenApi spec.
- private method processApplication was created to prevent duplicities.
  It returns application id. According the id will be retrieved data or
  application.

timeline.bodyText: Let docs reader know about the new way: @deprecated See submitApplication()
timeline.author: zlamalp
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -582,6 +582,7 @@ public Application call(ApiCaller ac, Deserializer parms) throws PerunException
 	 * Creates a new application.
 	 * The method triggers approval for VOs with auto-approved applications.
 	 *
+	 * @deprecated
